reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater vest well-made with tightly woven stitching and appreciate its appearance, describing it as a gorgeous classic sweater vest.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sleeveless knit cardigan is a Must Have in your closet!
items.body: Purchased the sleeveless knit cardigan in size XL, I can wear either a L or an XL depending on the style. This sleeveless cardi fits true to size, length comes to where my hips end, it is soft and well made, feels heavy but it’s not too warm. I will use often during the Florida cooler winter months with a crisp blouse underneath or a light turtleneck. Good purchase for the price. Read more
items.author: Sil

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty
items.body: Nice vest! The color is perfect = a beige grey. It is as pictured on the website. The feel is soft and comfy. No idea yet how it will wash - but as a vest this won't happen too often. I have worn it several times. Looks good. Long....fits the body well. Read more
items.author: Dee M

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice vest, very soft
items.body: I purchased this vest in several colors to use for layering. I've worn them a lot to work and also casually. Very soft and made well. True to size. Read more
items.author: Janett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful vest
items.body: Fits like a dream. Well made and very pretty. Read more
items.author: Shirley Goode

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for Medium- Cool Fall Days
items.body: Nicely made cable knit vest. . Keep it away from sharp ended objects such as a coat hanger. Color is nice and vest doesn’t wrinkle. It is not overly warm or heavy. Read more
items.author: VL Perkins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black knitted vest
items.body: This is a very nice knitted vest. I purchased an XL and it fits my 45" - 42" - 47" frame nicely. I am 5' 3.5" tall and it falls just below my hips. If your looking for a dressier vest, this is the one. I would purchase another color. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size
items.body: This vest was exactly the size I take. It’s beautiful and I love the pockets. Has so many colors that it works with different kinds of shirts. I love it! Read more
items.author: foxinu

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for that extra layer of warmth whilst still being stylish
items.body: This is such a cute vest. It fit perfectly and I love the fact that the pattern goes all the way around. Pockets are a definite plus. The material is soft and I have worn it on several occasions and have not had any pilling. Once my size comes back in other colors will be purchasing another. Read more
items.author: EBG

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Brown, Blue, Black, Orange, Dark Green, Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Purple, Yellow, Light Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
